title: Managing Diabetes with Diet and Tech in 2025
content: Diabetes management has evolved by February 2025, with continuous glucose monitors (CGMs) becoming more accessible. Pairing CGM data with a low-glycemic diet—think fiber-rich veggies, nuts, and lean meats—helps keep blood sugar steady. Recent studies also highlight the benefits of time-restricted eating for type 2 diabetes, showing improved insulin sensitivity when meals are eaten earlier in the day.
